"T-That our Padawans have become nearly cartoonishly fat since we last saw them in what couldn't have been more then an hour ago, and that they both seem to failed to even knowledge our presence since stepping into the room?"

"Good so its not just me then. So what do you think we should do then?"

"Obviously we have to start by getting their attentions." "BARRISS! AHSOKA!"

Amazingly enough both girls stopped eating and turned to face their masters, each with a slight glassly expression in their eyes. "BES BASTRE?" (Yes master) they asked together with their mouths full of food.

Luminara cringed. "First of all swallow what you have in your mouths." The girls did as ordered. "And second would you PLEASE explain both Master Anakin and I what happen to you two since we last met?"

Both Barriss and Ahsoka now looked confused.

"What are you talking about Master?" asked Barriss "Ahsoka and I simply came to the cafeteria to get something to eat, just like we told you."

"Yea Skyguy," Ahsoka chirped in, "We told you where we were going so why are both you and Master Luminara making such a big deal out of this?"

Anakin sighed, "Funny you should mention the word big Snips, look at how much food the two of you consumed within the past standard hour."

Both girls glanced at the piles of plates before them and were shocked. They couldn't had eaten that much together in one sitting could they?

"S-So we went a little overboard Master." Ahsoka stammered with a bush across her face. "That's still no reason to get so upset."

Anakin at this point smacked the palm of his hand to his face and let out a deep sigh, "Ahsoka look down at your stomach. Barriss please do the same.

Both Ahsoka and Barriss glanced down and were shocked by what they saw, the latter was stunned speachless like her Master had been but Ahsoka... "HOLY SITHSPIT!" the words that then came out of the young Togruta were a near standard minute long stream of swears and curses ranging from Basic to Huttese, stopping only because she ran out of breath. This left everyone stunned once more.

Luminara gave Anakin a cold glare. "Skywalker..."

"Don't look at me!" he said defensively, hands raised.

Barriss could only prod her bulging belly with a mournful look on her face. Her robe was now ruined, the tear she had noticed early had grown to the point where a large amount of her green skin was now showing, much to her embarrassment. How in the Galaxy did this all get so out of hand?

"How in the Force did we get so big?" Ahsoka moaned, voicing Barriss's own thoughts. "We didn't become this big when we cleared out the cafeteria on the last ship."

Anakin gave her a perplexed look. "Snips, what do you mean by 'cleared out the cafeteria on the last ship'?"

Her face twisted into a guilty look. "W-Well Master Barriss and I kinda... ate all the food the cafeteria had at the moment." When she saw her Master's disturbed look she added, "Although we just ate what was leftover from Dinner, nothing like not a fully stocked kitchen."

Luminara sighed and glanced over at Barriss. "Just tell us how this all started from the beginning Padawan, and we'll see what we can learn from that."

The young Mirialan nodded, "I'll try my best Master." she said trying her best as she could to bow with her newly super-sized stomach. "It started hours ago when both Ahsoka and I had woke up sudden and strong hunger pains."

"Sorry to interrupt," said Anakin. "But you said at the same time, right?"

Both Barriss and Ahsoka looked at each other and shrugged. "Yes Master Skywalker, why do you ask?"

"Didn't that strike either of you as odd, that you should both wake up at the same time with unusual food craving?"

"Now that you mention it Master Skywalker... I'll admit that looking back it does seem strange that both Ahsoka and I should wake up simultaneously AND both happen to have hunger pains together. Why it did not cross either of our minds I couldn't say... Either way getting back to the story: We had both woken up and decided to head to the cafeteria, which at the time seemed perfectly innocent enough."

When Barriss had finished all four Jedi were silent in thought. Luminara was first to speak. "I think I speak for everyone when I say judging from Barriss's story, it be a reasonable assumption that whatever is causing the Padawans bizarre hunger pains as well as their... abnormal amount of weight gaining within the past handful of standard hours is something physical, not Force related."

The others nodded. If the Force was somehow responsible for this mess, absurd an idea as that sounded, then any of the four of them would have felt SOME sort of disturbance in it. The Force itself felt like it always had, albeit now with a cloak of darkness tainting it somewhat.

Anakin turned to his fellow Master. "So if it is something physical, then we have to take them to the medical droid on board the station."

Once again Ahsoka blushed, "Do we have to Master? What if someone sees us?"

Anakin glared at her. "Would you prefer to stay as you are then snips?"

"No..."

"Alright then, lets get moving."

With that Barriss and Ahsoka nodded together and struggled for a moment to move their gargantuan guts from the table, and when they finally succeed THUD! Both padawans crashed to the durasteel floor like lead anchors.

Luminara and Anakin looked at one another, then at their dazed padawans. "Are you alright?"

"W-We're fine Master!" called Barriss as she tried her best to Force lift herself from the floor even with her green face a much deeper shade than normal.

Anakin raised an eyebrow at this. "You sure?"

"We're sure skyguy!" Ahsoka yelled, as equally embarrassed as Barriss was. Then with a good strong Force Push both of them were back on their feet, staggering somewhat before getting balanced enough to stand without crashing down again.

"You both good?" They nodded. "Then let's go."
